Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: AutoRetainer
Punchline: Collect and assign ventures to your retainers from the comfort of your bed.
Description:
Collect and assign ventures to your retainers from the comfort of your bed.

Plugin from https://puni.sh/api/plugins
Changelog:
- Multi Mode Expert Delivery
- - If configured, multi mode will handle expert delivery for you when your inventory is too clogged up
- - Configure in Grand company delivery - General settings
- - Feature is experimental and requires thorough testing
- - Note that this is not post or preprocessing task or anything like that. This is implemented as another step of Multi Mode, and will deliver whenever your inventory reaches configured threshold. This will work with a single character too and does not requires logging out.
- Added Character synchronization section. That section will allow you to mass purge deleted characters by using Lodestone.
- Improved compatibility with UI-modifying plugins
- Added remaining item count to expert delivery overlay

Author: Anna
Changelog:
- Fix certain minor errors not being retried
- Improve performance while installing large mods
- Fix install prompt only showing one per-mod update setting
- Add per-mod update settings to Penumbra window
- Change update process to be faster for larger mods
- Use less disk space for updates on filesystems without hard link support
- Add option to collapse Heliosphere settings in Penumbra by default
- Make Heliosphere settings collapsible on a per-mod basis in Penumbra

Note that updates for larger mods are still fairly slow, but a redundant step is
now skipped. Please report any bugs with the new update system (or install
failures) to our forums: https://forums.heliosphere.app/
Description:
Heliosphere is a mod manager and platform designed to work directly with
Penumbra. It enables efficient downloads and fast installs to let you get back
to the fun part of mods: using them.

Heliosphere supports:
- Direct install to Penumbra
- Compressed and deduplicated (read: small) downloads
- Automatic updates (optional)
- Version history
- Mod changelogs
- Pictures in Penumbra
- And more

Give Heliosphere a try, and see if you can't say goodbye to any old mod
platform you were using before.

Plugin from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ottermandias/SeaOfStars/main/repo.json
Name: Heliosphere
Punchline: An efficient mod manager and platform that integrates directly with Penumbra.
TestingChangelog:
- Fix a possible error in the multiple directory warning
- Fix updates for mods with duplicated files
- Add a first-time-user setup window to make onboarding easier

Author: NightmareXIV, Akechi
Name: Questionable
Punchline: A tiny quest helper plugin.
Description:
A tiny little quest helper plugin, which does quests for you automatically where possible. Uses navmesh to automatically walk to all quest waypoints, and tries to automatically complete all steps along the way (excluding dungeons, single player duties and combat).

Not all quests are supported, check the discord or git repository for an up-to-date list.

Required Plugins: vnavmesh, TextAdvance, Lifestream

Punchline: Let that sink in!
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Deprecate Supermarket Sweep by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RebornToolbox/pull/14


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RebornToolbox/compare/7.2.0.0...7.2.0.1

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: Rotation Solver Reborn
Description:
Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.
Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.
It is designed for `general combat`, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.

Plugin from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/CombatRebornRepo/main/pluginmaster.json
Punchline: Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Fixed CancelState triggering on death in PvP zones by @BrakusTapus in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/972
* Adjusted VPR rotation to account for bosses without positionals, added additional VFX path tracking for tankbusters by @LTS-FFXIV in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/973


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/compare/7.3.0.52...7.3.0.53

Author: NightmareXIV, Xenosys
Name: Splatoon
Punchline: Redefining FFXIV navigation with unlimited, precise waymarks.
Description:
Splatoon is a powerful accessibility tool. It revolutionizes gameplay with its custom waymark system, offering the ability to create unlimited grouped waymarks, labels, and actor indicators with exacting pixel precision. This feature empowers players by making crucial objects and events more visually discernible, thereby facilitating quicker reactions. However, it's important to note that the plugin does not come pre-loaded with presets. Players have the freedom to craft their own or import existing ones, offering a personalized touch to their gaming experience.

Plugin from https://puni.sh/api/plugins
Changelog: - Added filter by layout's zone

Author: Team Wrath
Name: Wrath Combo
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.
Description:
Turns one action into many! Similar to how PvP actions work, we take an action and build a whole combo out of it. Sometimes it's as simple as a 1-2-3 combo, other times it's a full job rotation. Either way, you'll find something suited for your rotation needs.

Author: daemitus, kawaii
Name: Yes Already
Punchline: Clicks Yes in various dialogs you've specified.
Description:
Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again! Also works with /regex/ and has several built-in modules for dialogs that aren't quite yes/no prompts but act like it (like desynth).

Plugin from https://puni.sh/api/plugins
